Plot: After receiving organ transplants from various animal donors, a man finds himself taking on the traits of those animals.
Title: The Animal
Writer: Tom Brady (story), Tom Brady (screenplay), Rob Schneider (screenplay)
Actors: Rob Schneider, Colleen Haskell, John C. McGinley, Edward Asner
tomatoConsensus: While less offensive and more charming than recent gross-humored comedies, The Animal is still rather mediocre.
